hasAttributes.name: OperationalMeasurementId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier either coming from previous system otherwise it needs to be define

hasAttributes.name: Purpose
hasAttributes.description: Specific purpose of resource consumption e.g. 'space heating' in case of burning natural gas

hasAttributes.name: Accuracy
hasAttributes.description: Information on accuracy of value e.g. 'metered' or 'extrapolated'

defaultValue.displayText: Projection based on data with unspecified accuracy
defaultValue.attributeValue: Projection based on data with unspecified accuracy

hasAttributes.name: Type
hasAttributes.description: General type of operational measurement e.g. energy, water or waste

hasAttributes.name: SubType
hasAttributes.description: Specific type of operational measurement e.g. district heating or water discharge

hasAttributes.name: Unit
hasAttributes.description: Unit of operational measurement e.g. 'kWh' or 'cubm'

hasAttributes.name: ProcuredBy
hasAttributes.description: Information on operational control ('who bought it?') of resource consumption according to Greenhouse Gas Protocol

hasAttributes.name: SpaceType
hasAttributes.description: Reference to specific space type (or 'whole building')

hasAttributes.name: LifeCycleAssessment
hasAttributes.description: Related life cycle assessment stage according to ISO 14040

hasAttributes.name: PostingDate
hasAttributes.description: Date of measurement posting in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)

hasAttributes.name: MeasurementDate
hasAttributes.description: Date of measurement was taken in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)

hasAttributes.name: ValidFrom
hasAttributes.description: The records can be used from this date onwards in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)

hasAttributes.name: ValidUntil
hasAttributes.description: The records can be used until this date in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)

hasAttributes.name: SensorId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier either coming from previous system otherwise it needs to be define

definitions.description: Represents individual data on energy consumption, water consumption/withdrawal, waste output or fugitive emissions including various further information (procured by, subtypes, purpose, covered time period)
